biocontainers.name: parsnp
biocontainers.summary: Parsnp is a command-line-tool for efficient microbial core genome alignment and snp detection.

biotools.summary: Parsnp is a command-line-tool for efficient microbial core genome alignment and SNP detection. Parsnp was designed to work in tandem with Gingr, a flexible platform for visualizing genome alignments and phylogenetic trees.
